NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Transportation or Adventure Activities?
NC.A: {Transportation} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Cultural Experiences or Shopping?
NC.A: {Shopping} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Cultural Experiences or Sightseeing?
NC.A: {Cultural Experiences} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Adventure Activities or Sightseeing?
NC.A: {Sightseeing} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Adventure Activities}
